name: css-background-repeat
description: Css module of single purpose classes for background repeat

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-background-repeat.css > css/css-background-repeat.css && tachyons src/css-background-repeat.css --minify > css/css-background-repeat.min.css && tachyons src/css-background-repeat.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
